title: C is for Crack Whore
description: From hotshot lawyer to struggling crack whore, Jenny's undergoing a change of race, change of face and change of profession. Will she spend the rest of her life earning money on her back or is there a chance to escape her fate? Corrupt police, ambitious coworkers and an unfriendly world all conspire to put her in her place, but she's not going to go down quietly.  This 7k word story is unsuitable for anyone under the age of 18 due to its depiction of sexual submission, body swaps and prostitution.
author: Natasha Koshkov
